item.title: Credit All
item.description: CW21 Hack Day - 2021-03-31 to 2021-04-01 Booth-1948 - HP4-CW21 Hack Day idea proposer Emma Karoune (representing The Turing Way Community) Malin Sandstrom (INCF, CSCCE) Idea name (provisional) Inclusive authorship/contributor tool Name ideas = Credit Me or All authors - Credit All Context and/or research domain Relevant to all domains to attribute contributions to research projects from all contributors more fairly in the authorship of academic publications. Problem Current systems that attribute contributions to authors in academic outputs do not include all of the jobs/roles/tasks that are encompassed in research projects.
